com.sebastiandine.cardcollectionmanager.services

Class CardBeanContainerServices

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sebastiandine.cardcollectionmanager.services.CardBeanContainerServices

  • public class CardBeanContainerServices
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides service methods for complex tasks related to the whole CardBean container CardBeanContainer.
    Author:
    sebastiandine

      static void updateEditedEdition(EditionBean editionBean)

      • CardBeanContainerServices

    • Method Detail

      • updateEditedEdition

        public static void updateEditedEdition(EditionBean editionBean)
        This method updates all CardBean objects in the container CardBeanContainer regarding its edition. If an edition has been updated, this method can be used to update all corresponding CardBean objects regarding the changes, made to target edition.
        Parameters:
        editionBean - EditionBean object, which has been changed.
